p: A total of 286 articles were obtained from the searched databases, comprising 232 based on biological activities (knowing that some publications report more than one activity) and 275 based on biological activity regarding isolated compounds. Publications were excluded based on restricted access to abstract, research area on nutrition (food supplements or stability) and irrelevant or unreliable results on biological activities. This review allows us to connect the biological activities of R. officinalis isolated compounds under search with essential oils and/or extracts.
